Rulings.Tengu:
● "Pot of Duality" cannot be activated during the turn your inherent Special Summon was negated (e.g. "Black Luster Soldier, Envoy of the Beginning" vs "Solemn Judgment".

● "Pot of Duality" cannot be activated during the turn you activated an effect that would Special Summon, even if the effect is negated, or resolves without effect (e.g. "Tour Guide from the Underworld" vs "Effect Veiler" or "Monster Reborn" vs "D.D. Crow").

 ● "Pot of Duality" can be activated during the turn the activation of your effect to Special Summon is negated (e.g. "Tour Guide from the Underworld" vs "Solemn Warning").

● "Pot of Duality" can be activated during the turn you activate "Future Fusion", but not during the second Standby Phase, when the Fusion Summon is performed.

Rulings.HAT:
You can activate this card if:
● You only have 1 or 2 cards left in your Deck.
● The activation of your effect to Special Summon a monster was negated this turn.

You cannot activate this card if:
● Your effect to Special Summon a monster was negated this turn.
● The inherent Special Summon of your monster was negated this turn.
● "Thunder King Rai-Oh" or "Mistake" is applying.

● You can Chain "Mystical Refpanel" to this card.

Rulings.Base:
1. The cards you don't choose are returned to the Deck, and the Deck is shuffled.
2. If you only have 2 cards left in your Deck, you can still activate "Pot of Duality". You'll reveal the remaining 2, add 1 to your hand, and the other will be returned.
3. You can Chain "Mystical Refpanel" to "Pot of Duality".
4. You can activate "Pot of Duality" and "Future Fusion" during the same turn.
